    • Method Detail

      • setReceiptRetrievalListener

        void setReceiptRetrievalListener(IReceiptRetrievalListener listener)
        Sets the receipt retrieval listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new receipt retrieval listener. This can be either an implementation of IReceiptRetrievalListener or IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of ReceiptRetrievalListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        IReceiptRetrievalListener, IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener, ReceiptRetrievalListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the receipt retrieval listener and sets it to null.
        Since:
        4.4.0.2

      • retrieveRefundableReceipts

        void retrieveRefundableReceipts(String acceptancePartnerPartnerUri,
                              String acceptancePartnerUri,
                              String storeLocationUri,
                              int startIndex,
                              int noOfRecords,
                              Date startDate,
                              Date endDate)
        Retrieve refundable receipts.
        Parameters:
        acceptancePartnerPartnerUri - the acceptance partner URI
        acceptancePartnerUri - the merchant URI
        storeLocationUri - the store location uri
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records
        startDate - the start date
        endDate - the end date

      • retrieveRefundableReceipts

        void retrieveRefundableReceipts(String acceptancePartnerPartnerUri,
                              String acceptancePartnerUri,
                              String storeLocationUri,
                              int startIndex,
                              int noOfRecords)
        Retrieve refundable receipts.
        Parameters:
        acceptancePartnerPartnerUri - the acceptance partner URI
        acceptancePartnerUri - the merchant URI
        storeLocationUri - the store location uri
        startIndex - the start index
        noOfRecords - the no of records

      • retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo

        void retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String acceptancePartnerPartnerUri,
                                                 String acceptancePartnerUri,
                                                 String storeLocationUri,
                                                 int startIndex,
                                                 int noOfRecords)
        Retrieves receipts by the merchant for the current logged in user. Use IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of ReceiptRetrievalListenerAdapter as the listener.

        On successful retrieval of data, the IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener.onReceiptListRetrievalSuccess(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.ReceiptList) will get called and on failure IReceiptRetrievalListener.onReceiptRetrievalError(PaydiantException) will get called. Refer to the core service IReceiptManagerService.getRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int) for applicable error codes.
        Parameters:
        acceptancePartnerPartnerUri - the acceptance partner URI
        acceptancePartnerUri - the merchant URI
        storeLocationUri - the store location URI
        startIndex - starting index
        noOfRecords - no. of records to retrieve
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
        See Also:
        IReceiptManagerFacade.retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int), IReceiptManagerService.getRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int)

      • retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo

        void retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String acceptancePartnerPartnerUri,
                                                 String acceptancePartnerUri,
                                                 String storeLocationUri,
                                                 int startIndex,
                                                 int noOfRecords,
                                                 Date startDate,
                                                 Date endDate)
        Retrieves receipts by the merchant for the current logged in user. Use IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener or an extended instance of ReceiptRetrievalListenerAdapter as the listener.

        On successful retrieval of data, the IReceiptRetrievalWithSplitTenderInfoListener.onReceiptListRetrievalSuccess(com.paydiant.android.core.domain.splittender.ReceiptList) will get called and on failure IReceiptRetrievalListener.onReceiptRetrievalError(PaydiantException) will get called. Refer to the core service IReceiptManagerService.getRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int, Date, Date) for applicable error codes.
        Parameters:
        acceptancePartnerPartnerUri - the acceptance partner URI
        acceptancePartnerUri - the merchant URI
        storeLocationUri - the store location URI
        startIndex - starting index
        noOfRecords - no. of records to retrieve
        startDate - starting date
        endDate - ending date
        Since:
        3.5.0.1
        See Also:
        IReceiptManagerFacade.retrieveRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int, Date, Date), IReceiptManagerService.getRefundableReceiptsWithSplitTenderInfo(String, String, String, int, int, Date, Date)
